name: Savor The Light
description:
Collect  powerup's which encase you in light and allow you to discover hidden platforms/buttons, Defeat powerful enemies to progress further into the unknown, Climb vines almost to the heavens, Uncover a hidden castle and look cool doing it!

Better move fast because as soon as the light runs out so do the hidden platforms...

Minimum Requirements: 
Windows 7 or 10 64bit 
2gb DirectX 11 capable GPU (something comparable to an AMD RX 460 or Nvidia GT 1030/1050, might run fine on lesser GPU's but i haven't tested it)
Intel I5 Quadcore or AMD FX Quadcore CPU
8gb Ram
